# # ## > : ## ### BPM `BPM(Business Process Management)` `BPM` ### BPMN `BPMNBusiness Process Model And Notation` `BPMIBusiness Process Management Initiative`BPMN `BPMN``BPM` `BPMN``BPM` `BPMN` ### `BPMN` - `Osworkflow`,osworkflow - `JBPM`, `JBPM4`JBPM5`Drools Flow` JBPM4 - `Activiti`, activiti5activiti6`JBPM4``activiti7`6`Tijs Rademakers` - [`flowable`](https://flowable.com/open-source), activiti6flowable6.4.1 - [`Camunda`](https://docs.camunda.org/manual/7.18/), Camundaactiviti5PVM ### : - [bpmn-js](https://bpmn.io/), BPMN 2.0 Web Web BPMN BPMN - [mxGraph](http://jgraph.github.io/mxgraph/)JavaScriptmxGraphjs - [Activiti-Modeler] Activiti web, - [flowable-modeler]flowableweb, ### [`Camunda`](https://docs.camunda.org/manual/7.18/)+[bpmn-js](https://bpmn.io/) # - `Camunda` - `bpmn-js``bnpm` ## Camunda 1. docker ```shell docker pull camunda/camunda-bpm-platform:run-latest docker run -d --name camunda -p 8080:8080 camunda/camunda-bpm-platform:run-latest ``` 2. `spring boot` pom.xml ```xml 4.0.0 org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-parent 2.4.4 com.tencent camunda_spring_boot 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT camunda_spring_boot camunda_spring_boot 17 7.15.0 org.camunda.bpm.springboot camunda-bpm-spring-boot-starter-webapp ${camunda.spring-boot.version} com.h2database h2 com.sun.xml.bind jaxb-impl 2.2.3 org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-test test org.springframework.boot spring-boot-maven-plugin ``` 3. application.properties ```properties camunda.bpm: admin-user: id: demo password: demo firstName: Demo filter: create: All tasks ``` 4. `bpmn-js`xml`src/main/resources/loan-approval.bpmn` [http://localhost:8080/camunda/app/cockpit/default/#/dashboard](http://localhost:8080/camunda/app/cockpit/default/#/dashboard) ## bpmn-js [demo](/fedlearn/code/bpmn-js/index.html) ```html BPMNJS

## Lerna


```shell
npx lerna init
```

PS: npx
- npxNode Package Execute node
- npx npm v5.2.0npm 
- 
- npx `npx lerna init`npm`lerna-cli``lerna init`



```
packages/
    header/
        src/
            ...
        package.json
        rollup.config.json
        jest.config.js

    footer/
        src/
            ...
        package.json
        rollup.config.json
        jest.config.js

            ...

        package.json

package.json
lerna.json #  
```

`package.json`npm/yarn/pnpm workspace

```
{
  "name": "root",
  "private": true,
  "workspaces": ["packages/*"],
  "devDependencies": {
    "lerna": "6.0.1"
  }
}
```

## 

- `lerna run xxx` scriptslerna run build
- `npx nx graph`
- `npx lerna add-caching``nx.json`
- `npx lerna publish --no-private`: npm
- `npx lerna run xxx --scope=header`header

## NX


> [NX](https://nx.dev/)Monorepo




```
npx create-nx-workspace@latest package-based --preset=npm
```

`packages`
```
package-based/
 packages/
    is-even/
        index.ts
        package.json
    is-odd/
        index.ts
        package.json
 nx.json
 package.json
```

 `nx.json`
```
// nx.json
{
  ...
  "targetDefaults": {
    "build": {
      "dependsOn": ["^build"]
    }
  }
}
```

`npx nx build is-odd` `is-event`

`npx nx run-many --target=build`

Module

### Controller

Controllerhttp

ProviderServiceSqlDao

## Middleware

Middlewareegg.jshttpController

![](https://docs.nestjs.com/assets/Middlewares_1.png)



- `implements NestMiddleware``NestMiddleware``use(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction)``next`
- `Module`

```ts
import { Module, NestModule, MiddlewareConsumer } from '@nestjs/common';
import { LoggerMiddleware } from './common/middleware/logger.middleware';
import { CatsModule } from './cats/cats.module';

@Module({
  imports: [CatsModule],
})
export class AppModule implements NestModule {
  configure(consumer: MiddlewareConsumer) {
    consumer
      .apply(LoggerMiddleware)
      .forRoutes('cats');
  }
}
```

-  `MiddlewareConsumer``forRoutes``exclude`
- Middlewareexpresexpress

```ts
import { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express';

export function logger(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction) {
  console.log(`Request...`);
  next();
};

```

## ExceptionFilter

FilterwebwebNest.jsExeptionFilter

![](https://docs.nestjs.com/assets/Filter_1.png)



- `@Catch(HttpException) class HttpExceptionFilter implements ExceptionFilter` 
- `@UseFilters(new HttpExceptionFilter())` 


## Pipe

Pipe HttpFilter



- `@Param('id', ParseIntPipe) id: number`idnumber
- `class ValidationPipe implements PipeTransform` Pipe`transform(value: any, metadata: ArgumentMetadata)`
- `@UsePipes(new Pipe())`controllerPipe

## Guard
Guard Httpnext()Guard`ExecutionContext`

![](https://docs.nestjs.com/assets/Guards_1.png)



- `class AuthGuard implements CanActivate`
- `canActivate(context: ExecutionContext): boolean | Promise<boolean> | Observable<boolean>`
- `@UseGuards` Controller `app.useGlobalGuards(new RolesGuard());` 

## Interceptor

Interceptor

![](https://docs.nestjs.com/assets/Interceptors_1.png)



- `class LoggingInterceptor implements NestInterceptor`,
- `intercept(context: ExecutionContext, next: CallHandler): Observable<any>``next()`
- `@UseInterceptors(LoggingInterceptor)` `app.useGlobalInterceptors(new LoggingInterceptor());`

## 

- `createParamDecorator`request
- `applyDecorators`  

PS: 

- JavaScriptTypeScript
-  @expression  expression 
- 

```ts
// 
function f() {
  console.log("f(): evaluated");
  return function (target, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {
    console.log("f(): called");
  }
}

function g() {
  console.log("g(): evaluated");
  return function (target, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {
    console.log("g(): called");
  }
}

class C {
  @f()
  @g()
  method() {}
}

// f(): evaluated
// g(): evaluated
// g(): called
// f(): called
```

## 
Nest.js

![](https://docs.nestjs.com/assets/lifecycle-events.png)



-  `onModuleInit()`, 
-  `onApplicationBootstrap()`web
-  `onModuleDestroy()`
-  `beforeApplicationShutdown()`, web
-  `onApplicationShutdown()`web

## 

### 

```shell
$ npm i -g @nestjs/cli
$ nest new project-name --strict
```

### 

```
src
|-- app.controller.spec.ts // controller
|-- app.controller.ts // controller 
|-- app.module.ts // 
|-- app.service.ts // service controller
|-- main.ts // 
```

### 

```shell
$ yarn
$ yarn start:dev
```
 http://localhost:3000

let mql = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 600px)');
document.querySelector(".mq-value").innerText = mql.matches;

var mql = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 600px)');

function screenTest(e) {
  if (e.matches) {
    /* the viewport is 600 pixels wide or less */
    para.textContent = 'This is a narrow screen  less than 600px wide.';
    document.body.style.backgroundColor = 'red';
  } else {
    /* the viewport is more than than 600 pixels wide */
    para.textContent = 'This is a wide screen  more than 600px wide.';
    document.body.style.backgroundColor = 'blue';
  }
}

mql.addListener(screenTest);
```

`Acron` 
```js

const acron = require('acorn');

/**
 * acorn
 * @param {*} code 
 * @param {*} ecmaVersion ECMAScript 
 * @returns 
 */
const getToken = (code, ecmaVersion = '11') => {
    const tokenObj = acron.tokenizer(code, {
        ecmaVersion,
        locations: true
    });
    const tokens = [];
    let token = tokenObj.getToken();
    console.log(token)
    while (token.end !== token.start) {
        tokens.push(token);
        token = tokenObj.getToken();
    }
    return tokens;
}

getToken(`const a= 1+1;`); // Token

// 
[ {
  "type": { // Token
    "label": "const",  //  const
    "keyword": "const", //  
    ...
  },
  "value": "const", //  Token
  "start": 0, // 
  "end": 5 //  
}, ...]
```

class Scope {

    constructor(type, parent) {
        this.parent = parent || null; // 
        this.type = type; //  Global, Function, Block

    }

    /**
     * ,
     * @param {*} kind 
     * @param {*} rawName  
     * @param {*} value 
     * @returns 
     */
    declare(kind, rawName, value) {
        this.targetScope.set(rawName, value);
    }
}

} else {
    if(alternate){

    }
}

# MonoRepopnpm+nxMonoRepo

# 

monorepo

- [lernaNx()](https://qborfy.com/today/20230119.html)

`MonoRepo`

> Monorepo
> 

`pnpm` `nx` `pnpm`+`nx`Monorepo

PS[node-gptcommit](https://github.com/qiubohong/node-gptcommit.git)+chromeMonorepo 

<!-- more -->
# 

## 

`node-gptcommit` 

```
node-gptcommit
 bin
|   ngptcommit.js
 dist
|   ...
 src
|   ...
 test
|   ...
 jest.config.js
 babel.config.js
 package.json
 pnpm-lock.yaml
 rollup.config.ts
 tsconfig.json
 tslint.json
 README.en.md
 README.md
```

`node-gptcommit-chrome`

```
node-gptcommit-chrome
 dist
|   ...
 src
|   ...
 test
|   ...
 index.html
 package.json
 public
 tsconfig.json
 tsconfig.node.json
 vite.config.ts
 README.md
```

`packages``npm init` 

```
node-gptcommit
 apps # 
|   chrome-extension # chrome
|  |   ...
|   node-cli # 
|      ...
 libs # lib
|   summarize # AI 
|      ...
 README.md
 package.json
```

## 



- `pnpm`
- node16.19.0+pnpmnode

```bash
# pnpm pnpm + workplace
npm install pnpm -g

# node
pnpm env use --global 16 
```

### 2.1 pnpm workplace

1. `pnpm workplace``pnpm-workspace.yaml` :

```yaml
packages:
  # packagespnpm
  - 'packages/*'
	# 
  - '!**/test/**'
```

2. `workplace:` 
- `npm_name: workplace: *`  
- `npm_name: workplace: npm_name@1.0.0` 
- `npm_name: workplace: ../npm_name`  

`apps` `libs``apps/node-cli` 

```json
{
  ...
	"dependencies": {
    "@node-gptcommit/summarize": "workplace: *",
    ...
	}
	...
}
```

3. `package.json` `scripts` 

```json
{
	...
	"scripts": {
    "build": "xxx", //
    "dev": "xxx",
    "test": "xxx"
  },
	...
}
```

### 2.2 `nx`

1.   `nx`

```bash
# 
pnpm install nx -g
# nx nxnx.json
npx nx@latest init

#  npx nx@latest init 
```

`nx``monorepo` 

- 
- 
- 



**nxnx**

2.  `nx.json`  

```json
{
	"workspaceLayout": { // 
	    "appsDir": "apps", // 
	    "libsDir": "libs" // 
	},

  "targetDefaults": { // project.json
    "build": { // 
      "dependsOn": ["^build"], // build
      "inputs": ["production", "^production"] // 
    }
  },
  "tasksRunnerOptions": { // 
    "default": { // 
      "runner": "nx/tasks-runners/default", // 
      "options": {
	      "parallel": 5, // 
        "cacheableOperations": ["build", "lint", "test"] // 
      }
    }
  }
}
```

`nx.json` 

- `apps``build``libs``build` `targetDefaults``"dependsOn": ["^build"]`
    - `apps``node-cli`build
    - `libs``summarize``build`
- `tasksRunnerOptions``cacheableOperations`

`nx.json` [nx.json](https://nx.dev/reference/nx-json)

3. `package.json``scripts``nx` 

```json
{
  ...
  "scripts": {
    "build": "nx run-many --target=build",
    "dev": "nx run-many --target=dev",
    "test": "nx run-many --target=test"
  },
	...
}
```

4. nx`nx graph` Monorepo
![Untitled](/assets/img/2023-03-29.png)
[nx](https://nx.dev/reference/commands)

# Typescript

> 
> 

`.d.ts`IDE`Typescript`

## 

Typescript

- `declare var` `declare var jQuery: (selector: string) => any;` `jQuery` 
- `declare function` 
- `declare class`
- `declare enum`
- `declare namespace`
- `interface``type`

`declare``Typescript` `interface``type`

## 

lib`import foo from 'foo'`

`npm`

1. `package.json``types``typings` `"types":"dist/typings/index.d.ts"`
2. `typings` `index.d.ts` lib
3. `typescript.json``"includes":["./typings/index.d.ts"]`

**PS:** `types``typings` package.json

`package.json`

```json
{
  "name": "@node-gptcommit/git-utils",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "git",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "types": "./dist/typings/index.d.ts",
  "typings": "./dist/typings/index.d.ts",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "tsc -p tsconfig.release.json --outDir dist && cp -r typings dist"
  },
	"devDependencies": {
		"@types/node": "^16",
		"tslib": "^2.2.0",
		"typescript": "^4.7.2"
	},
  "dependencies": {
    "simple-git": "^3.17.0"
  },
  "author": "qborfy",
  "license": "MIT"
}
```

`typescript.json` 

```json
{
  "include": [
    "src/*",
    "typings/index.d.ts"
  ],
  "compilerOptions": {
    "baseUrl": ".",
    "rootDir": ".",
    "target": "ES2019",
    "module": "ESNext",
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "strict": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "noImplicitOverride": true,
    "noUnusedLocals": true,
    "useUnknownInCatchVariables": false,
    "declaration": true,
    "declarationDir": "dist"
  },
  "exclude": ["node_modules"]
}
```

## index.d.ts

Typescriptpackage.jsonnpmindex.d.ts

- `export` 
- `export namespace` 
- `export default` ES6 
- `export =` commonjs 

**PS:** `function``class``interface` `export default` 

`index.d.ts`

```tsx
// index.d.ts
// src
export * from '../src/index';

// 
export declare function bar(): string;
```

`demo.js`

```tsx
//demo.js
//  bar
import { bar } from 'libs'
bar();
```

## 

`vite`

```bash
$ pnpm create vite
```

1. publicmanifest.json



```json

{
    "name": "ngptcommit",
    "version": "1.0",
    "description": "ngptcommitgit commit",
    "manifest_version": 2,
    "browser_action": {
        "default_popup": "index.html"
    },
    "icons": {
        "16": "images/favicon-16x16.png",
        "48": "images/favicon-32x32.png",
        "64": "images/android-chrome-192x192.png",
        "128": "images/android-chrome-192x192.png"
    },
    "background": {
        "scripts": [
            "background/background.js"
        ]
    },
    "permissions": [
        "tabs",
        "storage",
        "http://*/*",
        "https://*/*",
        "activeTab",
        "contextMenus",
        "notifications",
        "webRequest",
        "webRequestBlocking",
        "cookies",
        "unlimitedStorage",
        "webNavigation",
        "identity",
        "identity.email",
        "identity.read",
        "identity.write",
        "identity.launch.webauthn",
        "identity.launch.webauthn",
        "identity.manage.accounts"
    ]
}
```

chrome-extension

 public
|   images

|   background.ts
|   components
|   main.ts

 tsconfig.json

```

## 

vitewebchrome`background.ts` viterollupweb

> **[`Rollup`](https://rollupjs.org/)** Vite
> 

`Rollup``background.ts` :

```tsx
import { defineConfig } from 'vite'
import vue from '@vitejs/plugin-vue'
import path from 'path'

// https://vitejs.dev/config/
export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [vue()],
  build: {
    rollupOptions: {
      input: {
        index: path.resolve(__dirname, 'index.html'),
        background: 'src/background.ts',
      },
      output: {
        entryFileNames: `[name].js`,
        assetFileNames: `[name].[ext]`,
        chunkFileNames: `[name].js`,
      },
    },
  },
})
```



- `output` `hash`
- `rollupOptions``Rollup``Rollup``Rollup`

`package.json``scripts`background

```json
{
  "name": "@node-gptcommit/chrome-extension",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "rimraf dist && vite",
    "build": "vue-tsc && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview"
  },
  ...
}
```

- `dev:background` 
- `build:background` 



# 

## UI

1. ui `tdesign-vue-next` tdesign[https://tdesign.tencent.com/](https://tdesign.tencent.com/)

```bash
pnpm add tdesign-vue-next
```

1. UIbackground.jschatgpt:

```tsx
const getSummary = () => {
    // 
    chrome.runtime.sendMessage(
        {
            type: 'summary',
            data: {
                diffs: []
            }
        },
        (response) => {
            console.log(response)
        },
    )
}
```

## background.ts

```tsx
import { getSummary } from '@node-gptcommit/summarize'
// 
chrome.runtime.onMessage.addListener(async (request: any, sender: any, sendResponse: any) => {
    const { type = 'fetch', data } = request;
    if (type === 'summary') {
        getSummary(data).then(res=>{
						sendResponse(res);
				})
    }
});
```

chrome

    "dev": "vue-tsc && vite build --watch",
    "build": "rimraf dist && vue-tsc && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview"
  },
  ...
}
```

# 



>  Node.js `CommonJS`  `ECMAScript` 
>  `.mjs` `package.json``type=module``node xxx.js --input-type`  Node.js  `ECMAScript` Node.js  `CommonJS` [Node.js Modules: ECMAScript modules](https://nodejs.org/docs/latest-v16.x/api/esm.html)



1. `.mjs`node.js`ESM`
2. `package.json``"type":"module"`.js`ESM`
3. `--input-type`


## 

1. 

```js

import _ from 'lodash';

import { readFile } from 'fs';

import Demo from './Demo.mjs'; // 

export readFile;
export default readFile;
```

2. 


```js
//  `foo.mjs``foo.mjs`
import './foo.mjs?query=1'; // loads ./foo.mjs with query of "?query=1"
import './foo.mjs?query=2'; // loads ./foo.mjs with query of "?query=2"
```

3. `data:`URL

```js
import 'data:text/javascript,console.log("hello!");'; // text/javascript js
import { test } from 'data:text/javascript,function test(){console.log("test")};export {test};'; // js

import _ from 'data:application/json,"world!"' assert { type: 'json' }; // application/json json

// application/wasm for Wasm
```

4. assert()
`json` `javascript` `webassembly`

```js
import fooData from './foo.json' assert { type: 'json' };
```

5. commonjs

commonjs
```js
import { default as cjs } from 'cjs'; // module.exports 
import cjsSugar from 'cjs'; // module.exports
import * as m from 'cjs';
```

6. import() 

```js
const { default: barData } =
  await import('./bar.json', { assert: { type: 'json' } });

```

7. http/https()



- http2/3
- http127.0.0.1ip
- CookieAuthorization
- js

```js
import worker_threads from 'node:worker_threads';
import { configure, resize } from 'https://example.com/imagelib.mjs';
configure({ worker_threads });
```
